Revolutionize Your Bookmark Management with ai bookmarker!

Are you tired of disorganized bookmarks and lengthy lists that make finding your favorite sites a hassle? Say hello to the future of bookmark management with ai bookmarker!

Key Features:

- Smart Categorization: Automatically generate precise category tags for your bookmarks using advanced LLMs, including ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, and more.

- AI-Powered Summaries: Get concise, AI-generated summaries for every bookmark, so you can quickly grasp the content without having to click through.

- Comprehensive Search: Find what you need instantly with full-text search functionality that indexes all your bookmarks.

-Seamless Import & Export: Easily import and export your bookmarks, making it simple to switch browsers or back up your data.

- Auto Backup: Keep your bookmarks safe and accessible with automatic backups to Cloudflare R2 and Notion.

- Cloud Sync: Ensure your bookmarks are always up-to-date and synchronized across all your devices.

release : v1.0.1
- Support share bookmarks on x.com.

release : v1.0.2
- Newly supported languages: Japanese, Korean, French.
- Supports backup and automatically generates self-built or third-party navigation websites.


Upgrade your bookmark experience with ai bookmarker and enjoy a smarter, more organized browsing experience. Download now and transform the way you manage your bookmarks!
